Articles.Content:
I often need to return to the SPH just for adjustment of the max angle of the control surfaces, to improve responsiveness or adjust the frequency and/or amplitude of the ASAS/Mechjeb. Especially when switching between the two. I often have to deal with pilot-induced oscillation - the pilot being the computer, not me. It would help a lot to be able to adjust these and others during flight.

The tweakables I desire are

*Rate of adjustment (in degrees/sec)

*Maximum angle

*Linear progression or user defined (increase or decrease in rate, nice for keyboard flyers)

Thank you for your time.
I was about to yell at you since they can be tweaked, then I saw "durring flight" yea good idea.
